String.string: [{@Rgn:46014$$Three Towers Research Base}] Deliver the report to {@LinkCreature:246#2001$$Adeldur} at the Three Towers.
[{@Rgn:46014$$Three Towers Research Base}] Deliver the argon building fragments to {@LinkCreature:246#2001$$Adeldur}.
"I guess that would be my job."
Follow the footprints of the missing scouts and collect their marks.
[{@Rgn:46005$$Three Towers Depths}: {@Rgn:46016$$Mindcrown Chamber}] Deliver the marks of the missing to {@LinkCreature:246#2003$$Sleitak}.
[{@Rgn:46005$$Three Towers Depths}: {@Rgn:46016$$Mindcrown Chamber}] Talk to Scout Captain {@LinkCreature:246#2003$$Sleitak} about the missing scouts.
[{@Rgn:46009$$Three Towers Spires}: {@Rgn:46013$$Exetron}] Talk to {@LinkCreature:246#2004$$Greyden} about the missing scouts.
